place.name: ST VIGEANS
place.gazetteerText: St Vigeans, coast par. and vil., Forfarshire - par. (containing part of Arbroath), 12,731 ac., pop. 14,982; vil., on river Brothock, 1 mile N. of Arbroath. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
